web.text: I'm a so creative person, as a front-end developer it's so important merge the logic and the artistic part to helps to improve the ux and ui that my own webs and apps. I worked as web designer for a long time and I think that I can give my opinion y many situations about design.

skills.text: I move good inside the app, I understand the interface to design and export my assets, As a passionate person about design make animations and interactions it was so great.
Photoshop as a main apps to export my workspace, edit photos, crop photos, adapt my images, take a little photo retouching and design my mockups to present my websites to my customers.

I understand how I can to export files and the workflow , understand the comments from the designers and use their tools to do my work the better way.

develop.text: I'm a passionate about tech, I like to learn all about new technologies, think that the future is now. have a good bases to build the better way to make webs and apps.

commerce.text: In my way to improve my skills I found that amazing and incredible adventure that is build e-commerce sites. I know that all the time we think to change the future and it's a long time, but now we have so many tools to create it.

skills.text: in the vtex world I'm front-end developer in vtex legacy and vtexIO, use the vtex CMS to know all about promotions, clusters, catalog , producto and more, to make a good e-commerce sites and bring you the better experience to our costumers.
